verses.text: \w An|strong="H3068"\w* \w oracle|strong="H4853"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Malachi|strong="H4401"\w*.

‘\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* loved \w you|strong="H3808"\w*,’ \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. ‘\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* ask, “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* shown love \w to|strong="H3068"\w* us?” \w Was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s brother?’ explains \w the|strong="H5002"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts, ‘\w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* loved \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*,

but \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w transformed|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* ancestral \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w into|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* Edom \w says|strong="H3541"\w*, “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w beaten|strong="H7567"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ruined|strong="H2040"\w* \w places|strong="H2723"\w*”’ \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*, ‘\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w angry|strong="H2194"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*’s greatness reaches \w beyond|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”’ Against the Priests

‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* honours \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* master. \w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* master, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* fears \w me|strong="H5650"\w*? \w So|strong="H5650"\w* says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w*, \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* despise \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w You|strong="H4100"\w* ask, “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* despised \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?”

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w offer|strong="H5066"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* ask, “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*?” \w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* say, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* contemptible.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* animal \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w*, “\w It|strong="H7126"\w* doesn’t matter!” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* “\w It|strong="H7126"\w* doesn’t matter!” \w Give|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* animal \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*; \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w pleased|strong="H7521"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w*? \w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w receive|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* favourably?’ says \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w plead|strong="H2470"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w favour|strong="H2603"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w such|strong="H2063"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*. ‘\w Would|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w receive|strong="H5375"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* favourably?’ says \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

‘If \w only|strong="H1571"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* temple \w doors|strong="H1817"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* kindle \w useless|strong="H2600"\w* fires \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*! \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*,’ says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, ‘\w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w setting|strong="H3996"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*,’ says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

‘\w But|strong="H1931"\w* you \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* me when you say, “\w The|strong="H2490"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w of|strong="H7979"\w* \w the|strong="H2490"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w*, \w and|strong="H7979"\w* \w its|strong="H2490"\w* food \w is|strong="H1931"\w* contemptible.”

\w You|strong="H3027"\w* say \w also|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w How|strong="H2009"\w* tired \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*!” \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w sniff|strong="H5301"\w* contemptuously \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5301"\w*. \w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* blind, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*. \w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?’ says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

‘Cursed \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cheat, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* valuable \w male|strong="H2145"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w vows|strong="H5087"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemished|strong="H7843"\w* \w animal|strong="H7843"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,’ says \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, ‘\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.’
